channel.title: Command help
channel.description: I need code to make idems like [b]::archer[/b] and give you pure archer

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @firemastr666 firemastr666
item.description:
@firemastr666 wrote:

ok go 2 ur command section in ur client.java

do control f then 2 find fast type in banuser

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
sendMessage(“The starter packet for darianscape players !”);
starter = 1;
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already received your starter pack !”);
}

if u have that copy paste it under that

it says additem(995, 15000000); w/e but if u do this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
additem(1031, 1); there u added a nother item just kept doing that

with item id and number and if u see the like send message u can have that if u

want make it like uhhh “you just got a pure rangrer set now train 2 get 99.”

    sendMessage("The starter packet for darianscape players !");
    starter = 1;
} else if (starter == 1) {
    sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !");
}

now see this part

             starter = 1;
} else if (starter == 1) {
    sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !");
}

that how many time u can have it change the } else if starter == 1) { 2 like uhh

the number 2 u can change it so the player can only get it that many times…but

u can send a message saying u did ur 2 times don’t abuse or something theres

ur guide btw if u get a error pm me or u want 2 find something else out!~

~owner of darianscape~ ftw

Read full topic
